title: HTML Entity Converter
description: Encode or decode HTML entities for safe markup and readable text.

helper.encode: Escapes special characters like <, >, &, and quotes.
helper.decode: Turns HTML entities back into readable text.

option.nonAscii: Encode non-ASCII characters as numeric entities

empty: Enter text to see the result.

openGraph.title: HTML Entity Converter
openGraph.description: Convert text to HTML entities or decode entities back to text.
